reviews.text: Very fun place to watch some March hoops.  Not sure why they didn't use the layout of a traditional sports book.  They need more stadium/theater style...
The menu has variety of food to choose from. The food was delicious and will go back the next time we go to the casino. I personally tried the spicy shrimp...
Was here on a weekday evening for some wings during basketball games. The service was beyond horrendous. Our server took our order incorrectly, when I asked...
